review: Extremely good treatment  with dedication. Very good supporting staff with all facilities.  A really Good Doctor and friendly too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have visited Dr. Bobby thrice for my 6-7 year old daughter. So, you can imagine how a child at this age is 'mostly' scared to visit a doctor and especially in a situation where there is tooth extraction involved. To describe the problem: My daughter's milk tooth don't fall themselves even at their highest mobility and need external influence. Hence, here we go to Dr. Bobby! I highly recommend her whether it is for a child or an adult, for a number of reasons.
1. She is very quick in responding to either a message or a phone call. There's hardly a waiting time looking for a response from her.
2. She gives you the flexibility of choice of your time slot, in the morning or the noon. She considers your convenience..
3. She makes the child feel very comfortable and waits patientfully for the child to co-operate. 
4. She has great listening skills and ability to understand exactly what you want. Then she explains what is needed to be done and then proceeds with the treatment. She also explains what has to be followed post the treatment.
5. My child did not hesitate or cry even once when we had to take her to Dr. Bobby's clinic for the 2nd and the 3rd instance. She makes a great positive impact with her soft voice and great handling of the situation, on the child's memory!
6. Understanding the child's phsychology they treat the child with those things that children treasure the most.. whether it is a star on the hand for being brave or the tooth 'box' necklace that they give if the child wants to treasure the tooth/teeth for the tooth fairy! I mean my child won't trade any of these that she got from Dr. Bobby for anything in this world ;-)
7. The waiting time in the clinic is very less. Even when there is a queue, the speed with which the team works there is great. So, you hardly feel the wait time if any..
8. The clinic is well maintained and neat.
9. I wish I knew the names of the other supporting doctors in her clininc. They are very helpful and ready to support any time.
10. The location of the clinic is very easy to get to. Being right on the 100 feet main road, you can spot it easily next to Girias, Indiranagar. This is definitely one of the main concerns many people have - hence it is worth while to mention it - might help some body some day.
So, all in all, I think Dr. Bobby Thomas is one of the best Doctors you will come across !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ***** ** *** **** ******* **** ******* *** *** **** ***** ***** ******** *** ** she explains things in very simple terms, answers any questions you have and the way she deals with her patients in a calm and humorous manner makes it very comfortable. I had first visited her 10 years ago to get my upper incisors cosmetically replaced due to an injury and I was left impressed with the overall procedure and the outcome. After that procedure, I‚Äôve never had any issues with it. If you are looking for any dental related issues, I‚Äôll recommend Dr. Bobby always.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *********** *** **** ****** ******* ********** * **** ****  This is a great place to go take care of your teeth.  The team was very professional examining and providing with solutions by priority.  Recently, had Periodontal Flap Surgery & Root canal.  I am happy to say that I received the best care at Cosmetic Dental Clinic, Indiranagar, Bangalore. The staff is always professional and personable.  They use the latest equipment and techniques.  They provide recommendations without any pressure. And thats really important to me.  So it was a relief to find a dentist with integrity.  The staff Vijo Thomas and Niruta are respectful, caring and courteous.  I definitely recommend the following Specialist/Consultants for all your dental needs.  Dr. SAJIL JOHN Senior Consultant Periodontics.  Dr. BOBBY THOMAS specialises in Impaction/Impacted Tooth Extraction, Dental Implant Fixing, Smile Design, Teeth Whitening, Presurgical Orthodontics, Laser Gum Surgery.  Dr. Dhananjay Sanjay, Endodontists

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******** * **** **** ****** It's when I moved to another city that I realise how much difference a dentist could make in one's life to be confidently smiling. A filling or root canal done by her is lasting even after 16 years and even though I have been to 4 other dentists here, the treatment only left me with newer issues on the tooth they worked on when I had only gone for cleaning. Most of them are  not focussed on what the impact of a bad dental work would have on an individual.  I would travel to Bangalore any day to get my dental work done and that too only with Dr. Bobby as for her the work is her passion and a commitment. She is honest and sincere in her chosen profession.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Felt very comfortable with the confidence Dr Bobby has in treating me. she explained the pros & cons clearly for me to understand in a common mans level.she guided me to choose the right course of treatment in a practical way & gave space for my preferred aspects & timings also.finally at the counter after paying her treatment fees we will not feel we were taken for a ride, because she's very reasonable,so we can walk out thankful to her & smiling with the set of pearly whites she has given .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Bobby is the nicest doctor's that I have ever seen. Explained the entire process of wisdom tooth extraction. I know tooth extraction involves a lot of pain.
She made sure I don‚Äôt have any pain what so ever while getting the tooth removed and the Dr Kiran the surgeon very professional with clear instructions on do's and don'ts and was really patient to answer my queries..

And the staff is amazing and provide the excellent care to me.

A very good experience and I will definitely recommend Dr Bobby to anyone looking to talk to a dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Metal Braces Fixing,
review: Dr. Bobby Thomas is highly accomplished in her field of treatment apart from being a very good human being. Currently I am consulting her for my child's braces but I have been visiting her for various dental treatments for myself and my family for over 18 years now. The way she saved my tooth which I went to get extracted 18 years back is nothing less than magic. *** *** *** **** *** ********* ******* *** ******* Be it root canal treatment or braces or any other dental procedure, I just feel so safe to have her around, always approachable !

review:
One of the most comfortable friend in a doctor I have ever come across is Dr Bobby Thomas‚Ä¶ to handle my fear of dental panic attacks is not easy‚Ä¶ but she with so much patience and friendly banter just makes me feel so comfortable that I even started to enjoy my visits with her (though my pre visit fear still exists) Just the thought of meeting her has helped me make my teeth behave themselves.

Not to forget how she reminds me to follow up to help maintain my smile.

I totally endorse her as a brilliant Dentist and an awesome person as a friend.

Wishing you always the very best Doc‚Ä¶ keep Smiling and continue radiating the warmth that you help share in bringing a smile to all those who visit you‚Ä¶

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
So, I came to the Dr Bobby's clinic on a friend's recommendation due to severe tooth pain to be diagnosed with Pericoronitis due to the right wisdom tooth and an impacted wisdom tooth on left - and added to my fear the thought of getting the 4 wisdom tooth removed.

Dr Bobby made me at ease with comforting words, counselling and assurance. This added to the quick and efficient staff like Dr Jubana made my treatment smooth and efficient.

A big thanks to everyone there at Dr Bobby Thomas and I would recommend you all to go there for your dental concerns !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
It has been a pleasure being a patient at Dr Bobby Thomas dental clinic for several years now, and I can confidently say that the experience has been nothing short of outstanding. I was greeted with warmth and professionalism, setting the stage for a long and fulfilling relationship with a dentist who truly cares about their patients. The entire staff goes above and beyond to make each visit as comfortable and pleasant as possible.
It was a wonderful experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I was at Dr Bobby's clinic with a very uncomfortable feeling of hypersensitivity due to exposed dentinal surfaces.The condition was rightly diagnosed and the treatment recommended was explained well to our understanding.The session went fine with her treating the area very finely. She gave guidelines and manageable tips to avoid the recurrence of this clinical condition.
I recommend Dr Bobby as a dentist with expertise and friendly in her approach.
